xnn.objectives.objectives.absolute_error(a, b)[source]¶

Computes the element-wise absolute difference between two tensors. .. math:: L = abs(p - t) Parameters ———- a, b : Theano tensor

The tensors to compute the absolute difference between.
Theano tensor
An expression for the item-wise absolute difference.
